title: Chinese Dissidents Executed For Their Organs
teaser: An investigative journalist alleges that Chinese dissidents are routinely rounded up and executed so doctors can harvest their organs.
contentencoded:
Writer and investigative journalist Ethan Gutmann alleges that Chinese dissidents are routinely rounded up and executed so that doctors can harvest their organs for transplantation.

Gutmann joins Here & Now’s Peter O’Dowd to discuss the findings in his book, “The Slaughter: Mass Killings, Organ Harvesting, and China’s Secret Solution to Its Dissident Problem.”

Guest

  • Ethan Gutmann, writer and investigative journalist. His latest book is “The Slaughter.” He tweets @Eastofethan.
